briefTitle: Efficacy and Safety of Brimonidine Tartrate Ophthalmic Solution in Adult and Geriatric Participants With Ocular Redness
officialTitle: A Single-Center, Double-Masked, Randomized, Vehicle-Controlled, Parallel-Group Study Evaluating the Efficacy and Safety of Brimonidine Tartrate Ophthalmic Solution 0.025% Used Four Times Daily in a Population of Adult and Geriatric Subjects With Ocular Redness

interventions.name: Fluorescein Sodium and Benoximate Hydrocholoride Ophthalmic Solution USP

summary: To compare the efficacy and safety of brimonidine tartrate ophthalmic solution 0.025% with its vehicle for the treatment of ocular redness in a population of adult and geriatric participants with ocular redness.

primaryOutcome.measure: Ocular Redness as Measured by the Investigator Using the Ora Calibraâ„¢ Ocular Hyperemia Scale
